description: Web application lacks critical security headers - X-Frame-Options, CSP, HSTS, X-Content-Type-Options all missing
notes:
MEDIUM RISK: Application is missing critical security headers:
- X-Frame-Options: Missing (vulnerable to clickjacking)
- Content-Security-Policy: Missing (no XSS protection via CSP)
- Strict-Transport-Security: Missing (no HSTS enforcement)
- X-Content-Type-Options: Missing (vulnerable to MIME sniffing)
- X-XSS-Protection: Missing
These missing headers increase attack surface for XSS, clickjacking, and other client-side attacks.
